title: Goudy Handtooled only bolder?
content: There was a "hilite" version of Cooper Black at one time.
author: Mark Simonson

comments.content:
Tiffany, what's the breadth of the job ...   
you could do a Fake Handtooledï¿½   
on an ExtraBlack face.

really, a custom car place using Goudy Handtooled?   
   
did they think Handtooled = hand tools? ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050818052943im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
